00054 //Types used for configuration____________________________________________________________
00057 typedef enum {
00058     ZO_UART_PARITY_NONE = 0x00, 
00059     ZO_UART_PARITY_ODD = 0x30,  
00060     ZO_UART_PARITY_EVEN = 0x20  
00061 }ZO_UART_PARITY;
00062 
00065 typedef enum {
00066     ZO_UART_DATA_BITS_5 = 0x00, 
00067     ZO_UART_DATA_BITS_6 = 0x02, 
00068     ZO_UART_DATA_BITS_7 = 0x04, 
00069     ZO_UART_DATA_BITS_8 = 0x06, 
00070     ZO_UART_DATA_BITS_9 = 0x0E  
00071 }ZO_UART_DATA_BITS;
00072 
00075 typedef enum {
00076     ZO_UART_STOP_BITS_1=0x00,   
00077     ZO_UART_STOP_BITS_2=0x80    
00078 }ZO_UART_STOP_BITS;
00079 
00080 //Default settings________________________________________________________________________
00081 #define ZO_UART_DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE                       115200
00082 #define ZO_UART_DEFAULT_DATA_BITS                       ZO_UART_DATA_BITS_8
00083 #define ZO_UART_DEFAULT_PARITY                          ZO_UART_PARITY_NONE
00084 #define ZO_UART_DEFAULT_STOP_BITS                       ZO_UART_STOP_BITS_1
00085 #define ZO_UART_DEFAULT_TRANSMIT_TIMEOUT_MILISECONDS    1000
00086 #define ZO_UART_DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE                     32
00087

00116
